level.heading: Uniformity of application and construction.
level.text: In applying and construing this chapter, consideration shall be given to the need to promote uniformity of the law with respect to its subject matter among states that enact it.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 17-69
level.text: For Law 17-69, see notes following ยง 44-1631.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based upon ยง 10 of the Uniform Prudent Management of Institutional Funds Act of 2007.
